timeline.bodyText: Can we convert this field into a local variable?

yanghua

timeline.bodyText: These string literals are the same as FileSystemViewCommand. We can define them as constant fields and reuse them here?

yanghua

replies.bodyText:
ditto

@yanghua IMO, it is better to reuse title string like Total Delta File Size. Command string (show fsview all) maybe better to keep it the way it is, here and in FileSystemViewCommand, easier and clearer to known which command to run. wdyt
replies.author: hddong

timeline.bodyText: Can we break this command into a new test case? I always suggest one test method verify one thing. Additionally, this method seems a bit long.
timeline.author: yanghua

timeline.bodyText: Actually, I am thinking if the keyword Config is a good one. It seems this class only defines some config keys or say table header field names? So what about renaming it to HoodieTableHeaderFields or HoodieTableHeaderConfigKeys?
